Producer: DJ Pooh, Philip G. Atwell, Kip Konwiser
Sound Mix: SDDS, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, Surround, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: "The Wash" is an action-comedy starring Snoop Dogg and Dr. Dre. As mismatched roommates working at a car wash, they come together to rescue their boss (George Wallace) from a couple of first-time kidnappers. If they don't settle their differences and get Mr. Washington back, the good times at "The Wash" will soon come to an end.
Title: The Wash
